九州方面より艦隊を展開し、\n佐世保、那覇などの南西諸島\n方面の要港周辺を哨戒: Deploy a fleet from Kyushu and patrol the vicinity of Sasebo, Naha, and other key ports in the Nansei Islands! Ensure the safety of maritime transportation routes!
高雄警備府～比島北部沖: Takao Guard District - North of the Philippines
台湾よりバシー海峡を越え、\n比島北部友軍へ防衛輸送作戦\nを実施！また、南西方: From Taiwan, cross the Bashi Strait and conduct a defensive transport operation to our friendly forces north of the Philippines! Also, cooperate with the Nansei Area Fleet to secure control of the sea!
我が本土強襲を企図する深海\n機動部隊を八丈島沖で捕捉、\n我が捷号作戦主力を以: Capture the abyssal task force planning to attack the mainland off Hachijoujima, and intercept the enemy fleet with the main force of Operation Shou-Gou! Launch the fleet!
第十六戦隊で南西方面の基地\n航空隊を圧迫する敵地上戦力\nを撃破！その後、昭南: With the 16th Squadron, destroy the enemy ground forces pressuring the land-based air forces in the Nansei Area! Then, carry out a convoy escort between Shounan and Manila!
九州沖に出撃した敵機動部隊\nを捜索撃滅しつつ、敵超重爆\nより北九州の空を防空: Search and destroy enemy task forces that have sailed off the coast of Kyuushuu, while defending the skies of Kitakyuushuu from enemy super-heavy bombings! Fleet and interceptors, sortie!
佐世保鎮守府に入港しました。: We have entered the Sasebo Naval Base.
友軍の港に入港しました。: We have entered a friendly port.
周辺海域に敵機動部隊の動向あり！\n警戒せよ！:
There's movement of enemy task forces in
the surrounding waters! Be on the lookout!
南西方面艦隊、出撃！\nバシー海峡の制海権を確保せよ！:
Nansei Area Fleet, sortie!
Secure control of the Bashi Strait!
南西方面艦隊、捜索撃滅戦開始。\n敵通商破壊部隊を索敵、捕捉せよ！:
Nansei Area Fleet, start search-and-destroy.
Search for and capture enemy
     trade-destroying units!
対潜、対空、対水上警戒を厳とせよ！\nこれより戦場海域に突撃する！最大戦速！:
Maintain strict anti-submarine, anti-aircraft
and anti-surface vigilance! Now assaulting
     the battlefield waters! Full speed!
敵機動部隊主力を発見！\n全艦、突撃せよッ！:
The main force of the enemy task force has
been sighted! All ships, charge!
艦隊反転！決戦兵力を以て\n北九州方面に向かう敵を撃滅せよ！:
Fleet, turn around! Destroy the enemy using
our decisive forces as we head
     towards Kitakyuushuu!
連合艦隊、出撃ッ！\n敵機動部隊群を撃滅せよ！:
Combined Fleet, sortie!
Destroy the enemy task force group!
遊撃部隊、佐世保より緊急出撃！\n機動部隊先鋒を捕捉撃滅せよ！:
Striking Force, sortieing urgently from Sasebo!
Capture and destroy the spearheads
     of the task force!
